title: NeverLag报错问题
author: 小cheng
txt_content: [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]: [NeverLag] Default system encoding may have misread config.yml from plugin jar [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net/minecraft/server/v1_7_R4/ItemStack [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at jiongjionger.NeverLag.onEnable(NeverLag.java:352) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:316) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:368) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:410) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:438) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:372) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71243_i(MinecraftServer.java:519) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71222_d(MinecraftServer.java:493) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:453) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:337) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:643) [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)这个报错怎么回事，能不能修复，，。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 应该是编码问题，原帖那有 ansi 和 uft-8 两个版本，都试试。

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
RN]: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net/minecraft/server/v1_7_R4/ItemStack [17:53:20] [Server thread/WARN]:

使用了正确的服务端版本
和插件版本么？
另外craftbukkit似乎是少了点东西 大概
